Notes: If using alternatives try to get one with similar elongation and shore hardness
Ubiquitous on the secondary market look for deals. Similar pumps can be used in place.

Description/ID: 6 V 2 position 3 way mini solenoid valve

Optional for connecting the solenoid valves to the circuit
Any kind will do, I used Kapton
